properties.name: druid.initial-size
properties.description: Pool initial size. Setting this property larger than 1 in production environment

properties.name: druid.min-idle
properties.description: Pool min idle connection size. Setting this property larger than 1 in production environment

properties.name: druid.max-active
properties.description: Pool max activit connection size. Setting this property larger than 1 in production environment

properties.name: druid.max-wait
properties.description: Using this property carefully in production environment, it is reduce db performance

properties.name: druid.pool-prepared-statements
properties.description: Using PSCache, it is work in oracle, mysql5.5+

properties.name: filters
properties.description: For monitor: stat, for log: slf4j or log4j, for anti-sql-injection: wall

properties.name: druid.connection-properties
properties.description: For merge sql, and delay sql recording
